Class SelectionTestSuite

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.TestSuite
      junit.framework.SelectionTestSuite
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class SelectionTestSuite
extends junit.framework.TestSuite

Extension of TestSuite to enable test selection and prioritization at the test class level.

Version:
06/04/2004
Author:
Alex Kinneer
See Also:
Test, TestSuite

Constructor Detail

SelectionTestSuite

public SelectionTestSuite(junit.framework.TestSuite suite)
Constructs a SelectionTestSuite from the given TestSuite.

Parameters:
suite - TestSuite on which test selection is going to be performed.
Method Detail

run

public void run(junit.framework.TestResult result)
Runs the tests and collects their result in a TestResult. Performs selection and prioritization on members of the test suite which are test classes.

Specified by:
run in interface junit.framework.Test
Overrides:
run in class junit.framework.TestSuite
